name: Save the Animals!
description:
Save the Animals is a Rhythm game. A rhythm game which was built from scratch in two weeks! I had never built a rhythm game.

It's a prototype, I still need to make a tutorial, and adjust a lot of things! I know. But I want you guys to try it.

Just an FYI: I did the timing manually, created an xml and had Unity read it, which allows the "spawning" of the notes.

Thanks for the Jam! It was a lot of fun.
